channel.title: WPE Pro
channel.description:
Well, basically wpe pro is something that lots of peeps use to hack wow private servers, i dont know that much about it but basically it allows you to do several things, one of them being changing one spell into another ( e.g. casting fire ball and using arcane magic rank 7, or ,if it was possible to use on runescape, casting wind strike and using ice barrage). Now i basically have no idea if runescape runs on the same principles as wow but when i tried using wpe pro, though i didnt manage to do anything significant, i did manage to change some things which suggests to me that it might be possible to use it. In the end all i managed to do was change the text that things said when u did something, e.g instead of saying: "you eat the kebab" saying: "uuu uuu uuu kobob" and so forth. I dunno if this helps at all i just feel that if we can get this to work, it would be an actual real hack for runescape...
A link to a download for wpe pro AND a guide on how to use it ( for world of warcraft) is here:
[url=http://www.hsforum.net/?showtopic=5190]http://www.hsforum.net/?showtopic=5190[/url]
If your computer picks up wpe pro as a trojan, dont worry, it seriously is totally 100% safe, its just that it uses some of the same processes as a trojan If you computer doesnt pick up wpe pro as a trojan, you really need some new anti-virus software.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 15, 2006, 02:41:27 PM[/size][hr]does nobody want to be able to cast ice barrage with a lvl 3 account, or click to buy a bronze helmet and get a blue phat for 2gp instead?

item.title: WPE Pro
item.dc:creator: @tuppatsch tuppatsch
item.description:
@tuppatsch wrote:

p hats are easy to get. its called GOOD merchanting

people complain how slow it is to make money doing anything skillz barrows and merchanting.

but the facts are merchanting is by far the best.

when i was banned i was just about to reach 1bill =) (think i had like 900m worth of rares) at the time (which is worth more then double now) i made on average 2-5m a day merchanting
good days i could make up to 10-20m

Read full topic

item.title: WPE Pro
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Whatever. I don’t know why I even bothered with RS. I somehow wasted enough time to get 106 combat -.-

The graphics just plain suck. I can [literally]literally[/litterally] make graphics better than that with my drawing skills.

The company that owns it are a bunch if douches; call one person a noob and they will add a black mark. Try to appeal it and they say

“We have conclusive evidence you did this. Therefore the offence unfortunately will not be removed”

Arrogant asswipes. I can’t wait till the coders here who don’t actually suck figure out how to write to the cache; then Jagex will see who can be a bigger asshole.

Read full topic
